sentences.sContent: We provide courses in the field of physics, astrophysics and mathematics.
sentences.sContent_eng: We provide courses in the field of physics, astrophysics and mathematics.
sentences.sCn: 我们提供物理、 天体物理和数学领域的课程。

sentences.sContent: We are entering here into one of the most complex domains in astrophysics.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are entering here into one of the most complex domains in astrophysics.
sentences.sCn: 这里我们涉及到了天体物理学中最复杂的领域之一。

sentences.sContent: If they understood astrophysics, the aliens could confidently predict that the biosphere would face doom in a few billion years when the sun flares up and dies.
sentences.sContent_eng: If they understood astrophysics, the aliens could confidently predict that the biosphere would face doom in a few billion years when the sun flares up and dies.
sentences.sCn: 如果外星人懂得天体物理学，他们可能会自信地预测到，地球这个生物圈将在太阳燃烧并灭亡之后几十亿年之内面临毁灭。

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of the chemical structure of the stars and the forces that influence them
